Class Spacetime

  • java.lang.Object
    • Spacetime

  • public class Spacetime
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing everything in the simulated world. Essentially, the "grid".
    Author:
    Jiayin Huang, Tony Cui, Sally Hui

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ENTITIES
      The main layer.
      static int FOLIAGE
      The above layer.
      int shake
      The Viewport is offset by a random value from 0 to this value every time the graphics are drawn, thus resulting in a cool shaking effect.
      static int TERRAIN
      The underneath layer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Spacetime(int width, int height)
      Creates a new space-time plane of the specified dimensions.

      Checks if the two specified Shapes are intersecting.
      boolean isCollidingCheap(java.awt.Shape a, java.awt.Shape b)
      Does a cheap inaccurate check to see if the two specified Shapes are intersecting by checking if the rectangle bounds of the two specified Shapes are intersecting.
      boolean isCollidingLessCheap(java.awt.Shape a, java.awt.Shape b)
      Does a somewhat cheap inaccurate test to see if the two specified Shapes are intersecting by checking if the bounding rectangle of the smaller shape is intersecting with the larger shape.

        The main layer.

      • FOLIAGE

        public static final int FOLIAGE
        The above layer.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • shake

        public int shake
        The Viewport is offset by a random value from 0 to this value every time the graphics are drawn, thus resulting in a cool shaking effect. Default value is 0.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Spacetime

        public Spacetime(int width,
         int height)
        Creates a new space-time plane of the specified dimensions. These dimensions are in terms of GrassTiles.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the plane
        height - the height of the plane

    • Method Detail

      • addEntity

        public boolean addEntity(Entity e)
        Adds the specified Entity to the ENTITIES layer of this space-time plane.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to be added
        Returns:
        true if the entity was added; false otherwise

      • addEntity

        public boolean addEntity(Entity e,
                int layer)
        Adds the specified Entity to the specified layer of this space-time plane. Does nothing if the specified Entity is already present in the specified layer.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to be added
        layer - the layer to which to add the entity
        Returns:
        true if the Entity was added; false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the layer is out of bounds (layer < 0 || layer >= size())

      • removeEntity

        public boolean removeEntity(Entity e)
        Removes the specified Entity from the ENTITIES layer of this space-time plane.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the layer contained the specified Entity

      • removeEntity

        public boolean removeEntity(Entity e,
                   int layer)
        Removes the specified Entity from the specified layer of this space-time plane.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to be removed
        layer - the layer from which to remove the Entity
        Returns:
        true if this layer contained the specified Entity
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the layer is out of bounds (layer < 0 || layer >= size())

      • advance

        public void advance()
        Advances the simulation by one tick. Iterates through all of the Entities in the ENTITIES layer and calls the advance() method of each.

      • rotateEntity

        public boolean rotateEntity(Entity e,
                   double deltaTheta)
        Attempts to rotate the specified Entity by the indicated amount. Proceeds with the rotation only if the Entity does not collide with any other Entities in its new orientation.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to rotate
        deltaTheta - the amount by which to rotate, in radians
        Returns:
        true of the Entity was successfully rotated; false otherwise

      • translateEntity

        public boolean translateEntity(Entity e,
                      double dx,
                      double dy)
        Attempts to translate the specified Entity by the specified amount. Proceeds with the translation only if the Entity does not collide with any other Entities at its new location.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to translate
        dx - the distance to move this Entity along the X axis
        dy - the distance to move this Entity along the Y axis
        Returns:
        true if the Entity was successfully moved; false otherwise

      • moveEntity

        public boolean moveEntity(Entity e)
        Advances the location and angle of the specified Entity based on its velocity and rotational velocity. If the Entity collides with any number of other Entities, the notifyCollision() method of each of the colliding Entities are called.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to move
        Returns:
        true if the Entity was successfully moved; false otherwise

      • draw

        public void draw(Viewport viewport,
        java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Draws everything on this space-time plane, in order from the lowest layer (TERRAIN) to the highest layer (FOLIAGE). Draws an Entity only if its shape intersects the rectangle defined by the Viewport's current field of view. (Determined by using the offset value, zoom, and screen dimensions.) This is to prevent the unnecessary drawing of Entities that wouldn't be visible anyway.
        Parameters:
        viewport - the Viewport that is calling this method
        g - the Graphics context in which to paint

      • getCollidingEntities

        public java.util.List<Entity> getCollidingEntities(Entity e)
        Retrieves a list of all of the Entities that the specified Entity is currently intersecting with. This is for the ENTITIES layer. Returns an empty list if the Entity is not intersecting with anything.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to be checked
        Returns:
        a List containing all colliding Entities

      • getEntity

        public Entity getEntity(double x,
               double y)
        Retrieves the first Entity at the specified coordinates, on the ENTITIES layer. Returns null if nothing is there.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate to check
        y - the y coordinate to check
        Returns:
        the Entity at the location if it exists; null otherwise

      • getEntities

        public java.util.List<Entity> getEntities(java.awt.Shape selection)
        Retrieves a list of all of the Entities that intersect the given selection Shape, on the ENTITIES layer.
        Parameters:
        selection - the Shape specifying the selection area
        Returns:
        the list of all selected Entities

      • getSize

        public java.awt.Dimension getSize()
        Returns the width and height of this space-time plane. This is defined as: number of grass tiles widthwise x number of grass tiles heightwise
        Returns:
        the width and height as a Dimension object

      • getTime

        public long getTime()
        Retrieves the time value of this space-time plane.
        Returns:
        the number of ticks that have elapsed since this Spacetime started

      • isColliding

        public boolean isColliding(Entity e,
                  double x,
                  double y)
        Checks if the specified Entity would collide with any other Entities if the specified Entity were at the specified coordinates.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity being checked
        x - the x-coordinate to check
        y - the y-coordinate to check
        Returns:
        true if there is a collision; false otherwise

      • isColliding

        public boolean isColliding(Entity e,
                  double x,
                  double y,
                  int layer)
        Checks if the specified Entity will collide with any other Entities if the specified Entity were at the indicated coordinates in the indicated layer of this space-time plane.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity being checked
        x - the x-coordinate to check
        y - the y-coordinate to check
        layer - the layer at which to check
        Returns:
        true if there is a collision; false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the layer is out of bounds (layer < 0 || layer >= size())

      • isColliding

        public boolean isColliding(java.awt.Shape a,
                  java.awt.Shape b)
        Checks if the two specified Shapes are intersecting.
        Parameters:
        a - the first shape to be tested
        b - the other shape to be tested
        Returns:
        true if there is an intersection; false otherwise

      • isCollidingLessCheap

        public boolean isCollidingLessCheap(java.awt.Shape a,
                           java.awt.Shape b)
        Does a somewhat cheap inaccurate test to see if the two specified Shapes are intersecting by checking if the bounding rectangle of the smaller shape is intersecting with the larger shape.
        Parameters:
        a - the first shape to be tested
        b - the other shape to be tested
        Returns:
        true if there is an intersection; false otherwise

      • isCollidingCheap

        public boolean isCollidingCheap(java.awt.Shape a,
                       java.awt.Shape b)
        Does a cheap inaccurate check to see if the two specified Shapes are intersecting by checking if the rectangle bounds of the two specified Shapes are intersecting.
        Parameters:
        a - the first shape to be tested
        b - the other shape to be tested
        Returns:
        true if there is an intersection ; false otherwise
